聴こえる？ Boom Boom Boom Pow\r\n: Can you hear it? Boom Boom Boom Pow
消せない自分のインクで描いてる My Futureに\r\n: Drawing with my own ink on My Future that can't be erased
誰にも真似出来ない One and only\r\n: One and only, unable to imitate by anyone
輝く未来はすぐそこ\r\n: The shining future is right there
目の奥 Hot, Hot, Hot\r\n: Deep in the eyes, Hot, Hot, Hot
Can you feel the heat Yeah\r\n: Can you feel the heat Yeah
聴いたことないでしょ？\r\n: You haven't heard it before, right?
周りがとやかく、言ったとしても\r\n: Even if others nitpick and say
覚悟決めたの自分だし\r\n: I've decided, it's myself after all
私らしく I go (恐れないで)\r\n: I go as myself (Don't be afraid)
I know, I know, I know, I am\r\n: I know, I know, I know, I am
たまに挫けそうに なる時もあるけれど\r\n: There are times when I feel like giving up occasionally
あなたの手を、掴み乗り越えて行ける\r\n: I can grab your hand and overcome
Gonna, Gonna, Gonna 踏み出せ (Yeah ah ah oow: Gonna, Gonna, Gonna step forward (Yeah ah ah oow)
私らしく I go (I go I go) (恐れないで)\r\n: I go as myself (I go I go) (Don't be afraid)
Everybody, Can you hear this sound?\r\n: Everybody, Can you hear this sound?
「次も必ず観に来なさい！」\r\n: 「Be sure to come back and see the next one!」
